title: Boris Johnson speaks at UN of limbless chickens, Brexit and hangover cures – video
text: The British prime minister Boris Johnson has delivered his inaugural speech to the UN General Assembly just hours after the UK supreme court found his advice to the Queen to prorogue parliament was unlawful. Speaking to a spare audience late on Tuesday night about the challenges of technology, Johnson painted a dystopian view of the future of technology, asking: 'AI – what will it mean? Helpful robots washing and caring for an ageing population? Or pink-eyed terminators sent back from the future to cull the human race?'
description: Boris Johnson's dystopian view of the future is filled with pink-eyed terminators and limbless chickens
